## codepointToCharacter() function

Unicode 码点转为 UTF8 字符。

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function codepointToCharacter(codepoint: string): string;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  codepoint | string | 码点，支持以 <code>-</code> 分割多个码点 |

**Returns:**

string
